des: "Great appetizer on crackers!  Whenever I go to a party, I get requested to make this.  I never come home with leftovers!  I like to use Lawry's Tabasco Seasoned Salt, it's hot, but good!"
ins: In a large bowl, stir together the crabmeat, celery, onion, parsley, mustard, mayonnaise, pepper, and garlic powder.  Season to taste with seasoned salt, fold in black olives if using.  Cover, and refrigerate for at least 45 minutes.  Taste before serving and adjust seasonings to taste.
